name: A Prayer of Deliverance
text:
From our enemies amongst the living,
Talos deliver us.

From our enemies amongst the dead,
Arkay deliver us.

From loneliness and despair,
Dibella deliver us.

From ignorance and misrule,
Julianos deliver us.

From drought and famine,
Kynareth deliver us.

From injustice and misfortune,
Stendarr deliver us.

From thieves and swindlers,
Zenithar deliver us.

From cruelty and intolerance,
Mara deliver us.

From those that dwell in Oblivion,
Akatosh deliver us.
